monogr.title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Antiquitatum Romanarum quae supersunt, Vol III
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

p.#text:
*ti/tou de\ *gegani/ou *makeri/nou kai\ *popli/ou *mhnuki/ou
th\n u(/paton e)cousi/an paralabo/ntwn si/tou spa/nis
i)sxura\ th\n *(rw/mhn kate/sxen e)k th=s a)posta/sews
labou=sa th\n a)rxh/n. o( me\n ga\r dh=mos a)pe/sth tw=n
patriki/wn meta\ th\n metopwrinh\n i)shmeri/an u(p' au)th\n 
ma/lista th\n a)rxh\n tou= spo/rou: e)ce/lipon de\ th\n xw/ran
oi( gewrgou=ntes a(/ma th=| kinh/sei kai\ die/sthsan oi( me\n
eu)xere/steroi pro\s tou\s patriki/ous, to\ de\ qhtiko\n me/ros
w(s tou\s dhmotikou/s: kai\ die/meinan e)c e)kei/nou
xwri\s a)llh/lwn o)/ntes, e(/ws ou(= kate/sth kai\ sunh=lqen h( 
po/lis ei)s e(auth\n ou) pollw=| pro/teron diallagei=sa th=s

xeimerinh=s troph=s. to\n de\ metacu\ xro/non, e)n w(=| o( pa=s
e)pitelei=tai spo/ros w(rai=os, e)/rhmos h( xw/ra tw=n e)pimelhsome/nwn
h)=n kai\ e)pi\ polu\n xro/non diete/lesen, w(/ste
mhde\ katelqou=si toi=s gewrgoi=s a)nalabei=n au)th\n e)/ti
r(a/|dion ei)=nai dou/lwn t' a)posta/sei kai\ kthnw=n o)le/qrw|,
meq' w(=n au)th\n e)/mellon e)rga/zesqai kekakwme/nhn, a)formh=s
t' ou) polloi=s ei)s to\n e)pio/nta e)niauto\n u(parxou/shs
ou)/te sperma/twn ou)/te trofh=s. tau=q' h( boulh\ maqou=sa
pre/sbeis diepe/mpeto pro\s *turrhnou\s kai\ *kampanou\s 
kai\ to\ kalou/menon *pwmenti=non pedi/on si=ton o(/son a)\n
du/nainto plei=ston w)nhsome/nous: *po/plios de\ *ou)ale/rios
kai\ *leu/kios *gega/nios ei)s *sikeli/an a)pesta/lhsan, *ou)ale/rios
me\n ui(o\s w)\n *popliko/la, *gega/nios de\ qate/rou
tw=n u(pa/twn a)delfo/s. tu/rannoi de\ to/te kata\ po/leis 
me\n h)=san, e)pifane/statos de\ *ge/lwn o( *deinome/nous 
newsti\ th\n *(ippokra/tous  turanni/da pareilhfw/s, 
ou)xi\ *dionu/sios o( *surakou/sios, w(s *liki/nnios
ge/grafe kai\ *ge/llios kai\ a)/lloi suxnoi\ tw=n *(rwmai/wn 
suggrafe/wn ou)qe\n e)chtako/tes tw=n peri\ tou\s xro/nous
a)kribw=s, w(s au)to\ dhloi= tou)=rgon, a)ll' ei)kh= to\ prostuxo\n
a)pofaino/menoi. h( me\n ga\r ei)s *sikeli/an a)podeixqei=sa
presbei/a kata\ to\n deu/teron e)niauto\n th=s
e(bdomhkosth=s kai\ deute/ras o)lumpia/dos e)ce/pleusen a)/rxontos
*)aqh/nhsin *(ubrili/dou, e(ptakai/deka dielqo/ntwn
e)tw=n meta\ th\n e)kbolh\n tw=n basile/wn, w(s ou(=toi/ te kai\

oi( a)/lloi sxedo\n a(/pantes suggrafei=s o(mologou=si: *dionu/sios
d' o( presbu/teros o)gdohkostw=| kai\ pe/mptw| meta\
tau=t' e)/tei *surakousi/ois e)panasta\s kate/sxe th\n turanni/da
kata\ to\n tri/ton e)niauto\n th=s e)nenhkosth=s kai\
tri/ths o)lumpia/dos a)/rxontos *)aqh/nhsi *kalli/ou tou= met' 
*)antige/nh. o)li/gois me\n ou)=n e)/tesi diamartei=n tw=n xro/nwn 
doi/h tis a)\n i(storikoi=s a)ndra/sin a)rxai/as kai\ poluetei=s
suntattome/nois pragmatei/as, geneai=s de\ dusi\n
h)\ trisi\n o(/lais a)poplanhqh=nai th=s a)lhqei/as ou)k a)\n
e)pitre/yeien. a)ll' e)/oiken o( prw=tos e)n tai=s w(rografi/ais 
tou=to kataxwri/sas, w(=| pa/ntes h)kolou/qhsan oi(
loipoi/, tosou=to mo/non e)n tai=s a)rxai/ais eu(rw\n a)nagrafai=s,
o(/ti pre/sbeis a)pesta/lhsan e)pi\ tou/twn tw=n
u(pa/twn ei)s *sikeli/an si=ton w)nhso/menoi kai\ parh=san
e)kei=qen a)/gontes h(\n o( tu/rannos e)/dwke dwrea/n, ou)ke/ti 
mh\n para\ tw=n *(ellhnikw=n e)ceta/sai suggrafe/wn, o(/stis
h)=n tu/rannos to/te *sikeli/as, a)basani/stws de/ pws kai\
kata\ to\ prostuxo\n qei=nai to\n *dionu/sion.

oi( me\n ou)=n e)pi\ *sikeli/as ple/ontes pre/sbeis
xeimw=ni xrhsa/menoi kata\ qa/lattan kai\ ku/klw| th\n nh=son 
periplei=n a)nagkasqe/ntes xro/nioi/ te kath/xqhsan
pro\s to\n tu/rannon, kai\ th\n xeimerinh\n e)kei= diatri/yantes
w(/ran meta\ qe/ros e)panh=lqon ei)s *)itali/an polla\s komi/zontes
a)gora/s. oi( d' ei)s to\ *pwmenti=non a)postale/ntes 
pedi/on o)li/gou me\n e)de/hsan w(s kata/skopoi pro\s tw=n 
*ou)olou/skwn a)naireqh=nai diablhqe/ntes u(po\ tw=n e)k

*(rw/mhs fuga/dwn, xalepw=s de\ pa/nu dia\ th\n proqumi/an
tw=n i)dioce/nwn au)ta\ diasw=sai dunhqe/ntes ta\ sw/mata, 
di/xa tw=n xrhma/twn a)ne/streyan ei)s th\n *(rw/mhn a)/praktoi.
o(/moia de\ tou/tois sune/bh paqei=n kai\ toi=s ei)s th\n *)italiw=tin
a)fikome/nois *ku/mhn. kai\ ga\r au)to/qi polloi\
*(rwmai/wn diatri/bontes, oi( su\n tw=| basilei= *tarkuni/w|
diaswqe/ntes e)k th=s teleutai/as ma/xhs fuga/des, to\ me\n
prw=ton e)caitei=sqai para\ tou= tura/nnou tou\s a)/ndras
e)pexei/rhsan e)pi\ qana/tw|, a)potuxo/ntes de\ tou/tou r(u/sia
katasxei=n tau=ta ta\ sw/mata para\ th=s a)pestalkui/as
po/lews h)ci/oun, e(/ws a)pola/bwsi ta\s e(autw=n ou)si/as, a(\s
e)/fasan u(po\ *(rwmai/wn a)di/kws dedhmeu=sqai, kai\ tau/ths
w)/|onto dei=n th=s di/khs to\n tu/rannon au)toi=s gene/sqai
krith/n. o( de\ turannw=n to/te th=s *ku/mhs *)aristo/dhmos
h)=n o( *)aristokra/tous, a)nh\r ou) tw=n e)pituxo/ntwn e(/neka
ge/nous, o(\s e)kalei=to *malako\s u(po\ tw=n a)stw=n kai\ su\n
xro/nw| gnwrimwte/ran tou= o)no/matos e)/sxe th\n klh=sin,
ei)/q' o(/ti qhludri/as e)ge/neto pai=s w)\n kai\ ta\ gunaici\n 
a(rmo/ttonta e)/pasxen, w(s i(storou=si/ tines, ei)/q' o(/ti pra=|os
h)=n fu/sei kai\ malako\s ei)s o)rgh/n, w(s e(/teroi gra/fousin.
a)formai=s de\ th=s turanni/dos o(poi/ais e)xrh/sato kai\ ti/nas
h)=lqen e)p' au)th\n o(dou\s kai\ pw=s diw/|khse ta\ kata\ th\n
a)rxh\n katastrofh=s q' o(poi/as e)/tuxen, ou)k a)/kairon
ei)=nai dokw= mikro\n e)pisth/sas th\n *(rwmai+kh\n dih/ghsin:
kefalaiwdw=s diecelqei=n.

e)pi\ th=s e(chkosth=s kai\ teta/rths o)lumpia/dos
a)/rxontos *)aqh/nhsi *miltia/dou *ku/mhn th\n e)n *)opikoi=s
*(ellhni/da po/lin, h(\n *)eretriei=s te kai\ *xalkidei=s e)/ktisan,
*turrhnw=n oi( peri\ to\n *)io/nion ko/lpon katoikou=ntes
e)kei=qe/n q' u(po\ tw=n *keltw=n e)celasqe/ntes su\n xro/nw|, 
kai\ su\n au)toi=s *)ombrikoi/ te kai\ *dau/nioi kai\ suxnoi\
tw=n a)/llwn barba/rwn e)pexei/rhsan a)nelei=n ou)demi/an
e)/xontes ei)pei=n pro/fasin tou= mi/sous dikai/an o(/ti mh\
th\n eu)daimoni/an th=s po/lews. h)=n ga\r *ku/mh kat' e)kei/nous 
tou\s xro/nous peribo/htos a)na\ th\n *)itali/an o(/lhn 
plou/tou te kai\ duna/mews e(/neka kai\ tw=n a)/llwn a)gaqw=n
gh=n te kate/xousa th=s *kampanw=n pedia/dos th\n polukarpota/thn
kai\ lime/nwn kratou=sa tw=n peri\ *mishno\n
e)pikairota/twn. tou/tois e)pibouleu/santes toi=s a)gaqoi=s
oi( ba/rbaroi strateu/ousin e)p' au)th/n, pezoi\ me\n ou)k 
e)la/ttous penth/konta muria/dwn, i(ppei=s de\ duei=n xilia/dwn
a)pode/ontes ei)=nai dismu/rioi. e)stratopedeuko/si d'
au)toi=s ou) makra\n a)po\ th=s po/lews te/ras gi/netai qaumasto/n,
oi(=on e)n ou)deni\ xro/nw| mnhmoneu/etai geno/menon
ou)/q' *(ella/dos ou)/te barba/rou gh=s ou)damo/qi. oi(  
para\ ta\ strato/peda r(e/ontes au)tw=n potamoi/, *ou)oltou=rnos
o)/noma qate/rw|, tw=| d' e(te/rw| *gla/nis, a)fe/ntes
ta\s kata\ fu/sin o(dou\s a)ne/streyan ta\ na/mata kai\ me/xri

pollou= diete/lesan a)po\ tw=n stoma/twn a)naxwrou=ntes
e)pi\ ta\s phga/s. tou=to katamaqo/ntes oi( *kumai=oi to/t' 
e)qa/rrhsan o(mo/se toi=s barba/rois xwrei=n w(s tou= daimoni/ou
tapeina\ me\n ta)kei/nwn mete/wra qh/sontos, u(yhla\
de\ ta\ dokou=nta ei)=nai sfw=n tapeina/. nei/mantes de\ th\n
e)n a)kmh=| du/namin a(/pasan trixh=|, mia=| me\n th\n po/lin
e)frou/roun, th=| d' e(te/ra| ta\s nau=s ei)=xon e)n fulakh=|, th=|
de\ tri/th| pro\ tou= tei/xous taca/menoi tou\s e)pio/ntas e)de/xonto.
tou/twn i(ppei=s me\n h)=san e(cako/sioi, pezoi\ de\
tetrakisxi/lioi kai\ penta)ko/sioi: kai\ ou(/tws o)/ntes to\n
a)riqmo\n o)li/goi ta\s tosau/tas u(pe/sthsan muria/das.

w(s de\ kate/maqon au)tou\s oi( ba/rbaroi ma/xesqai
pareskeuasme/nous, a)lala/cantes e)xw/roun o(mo/se to\n
ba/rbaron tro/pon a)/neu ko/smou pezoi/ te kai\ i(ppei=s
a)nami\c w(s a(/pantas a)narpaso/menoi. h)=n de\ to\ pro\ th=s
po/lews xwri/on, e)n w(=| sune/misgon a)llh/lois, au)lw\n steno\s
o)/resi kai\ li/mnais perikleio/menos, th=| me\n a)reth=|
tw=n *kumai/wn su/mmaxos, tw=| de\ plh/qei tw=n barba/rwn
pole/mios. a)natrepo/menoi ga\r u(p' a)llh/lwn kai\ sumpatou/menoi
pollaxh=| me\n kai\ a)/llh|, ma/lista de\ peri\ ta\
te/lmata th=s li/mnhs, ou)d' ei)s xei=ras e)lqo/ntes th=| fa/laggi 
tw=n *(ellh/nwn au)toi\ di' au(tw=n oi( plei/ous diefqa/rhsan:
kai\ o( me\n pezo\s au)tw=n strato\s o( polu\s peri\
e(autw=| sfalei/s, e)/rgon de\ gennai=on ou)de\n a)podeica/menos,
a)/llos a)/llh| diaskedasqei\s e)/fugen: oi( d' i(ppei=s sunh=lqon
me\n o(mo/se kai\ polu\n toi=s *(/ellhsin ou(=toi pare/sxon

po/non. a)du/natoi d' o)/ntes kuklw/sasqai tou\s polemi/ous
dia\ stenoxwri/an, kai/ ti kai\ tou= daimoni/ou keraunoi=s
kai\ u(/dasi kai\ brontai=s sunagwnisame/nou toi=s
*(/ellhsi, dei/santes ei)s fugh\n tre/pontai. e)n tau/th| th=| 
ma/xh| pa/ntes me\n oi( tw=n *kumai/wn i(ppei=s lamprw=s h)gwni/santo, 
kai\ th=s ni/khs ou(=toi ma/lista w(mologou=nto
ai)/tioi gene/sqai, u(pe\r a(/pantas de\ tou\s a)/llous *)aristo/dhmos
o( *malako\s e)pikalou/menos: kai\ ga\r to\n h(gemo/na
tw=n polemi/wn ou(=tos a)pe/kteine mo/nos u(posta\s kai\ a)/llous
pollou\s kai\ a)gaqou/s. luqe/ntos de\ tou= pole/mou 
ta\s xaristhri/ous qusi/as a)podo/ntes oi( *kumai=oi toi=s
qeoi=s kai\ tafa\s tw=n a)poqano/ntwn  e)n th=| ma/xh|
lampra\s poihsa/menoi peri\ tw=n a)ristei/wn, o(/tw| xrh\ to\n
prw=ton a)podou=nai ste/fanon, ei)s pollh\n kate/sthsan
e)/rin. oi( me\n ga\r a)ke/raioi kritai\ to\n *)aristo/dhmon 
e)bou/lonto timh=sai, kai\ h)=n o( dh=mos a(/pas met' e)kei/nou:
oi( de\ dunatoi\ to\n i(ppa/rxhn *(ippome/donta, kai\ h( boulh\
pa=sa tou/tw| sunela/mbanen: h)=n d' a)ristokratikh\ to/te
para\ toi=s *kumai/ois h( politei/a, kai\ o( dh=mos ou) pollw=n
tinwn ku/rios. sta/sews de\ dia\ tau/thn th\n e)/rin a)nistame/nhs 
dei/santes oi( presbu/teroi, mh\ pro\s o(/pla kai\
fo/nous xwrh/sh| to\ filo/timon, e)/peisan a)mfote/ras ta\s
ta/ceis sugxwrh=sai ta\s i)/sas labei=n tima\s e(ka/teron tw=n
a)ndrw=n. a)po\ tau/ths gi/netai th=s a)rxh=s dh/mou prosta/ths 
o(  *)aristo/dhmos kai\ lo/gou politikou= 
du/namin a)skh/sas e)cedhmagw/gei to\ plh=qos, politeu/masi/

te kexarisme/nois a)nalamba/nwn kai\ tou\s sfeterizome/nous
ta\ koina\ tw=n dunatw=n e)cele/gxwn kai\ a)po\ tw=n
e(autou= xrhma/twn pollou\s tw=n penh/twn eu)= poiw=n: kai\
h)=n toi=s proesthko/si th=s a)ristokrati/as dia\ tau=t' e)paxqh\s 
kai\ fobero/s.

ei)kostw=| d' u(/steron e)/tei th=s pro\s tou\s barba/rous
ma/xhs h)=lqon w(s tou\s *kumai/ous *)arikhnw=n pre/sbeis
su\n i(kethri/ais a)ciou=ntes au)tou\s bohqh=sai sfi/sin
u(po\ *turrhnw=n polemoume/nois. meta\ ga\r ta\s diallaga/s,
a(\s e)poih/sato pro\s th\n *(rwmai/wn po/lin o( basileu\s tw=n
*turrhnw=n *porsi/nas, to\n ui(o\n *)/arronta dou\s th\n h(mi/seian
th=s stratia=s e)/pemyen i)di/an a)rxh\n kth/sasqai
boulo/menon, w(s e)n toi=s pro\ tou/tou dedh/lwka lo/gois:
o(\s e)polio/rkei to/te tou\s *)arikhnou\s katapefeugo/tas ei)s
to\ tei=xos kai\ ou) dia\ makrou= limw=| th\n po/lin ai(rh/sein
w)/|eto. tau/ths th=s presbei/as a)fikome/nhs oi( proesthko/tes
th=s a)ristokrati/as misou=ntes to\n *)aristo/dhmon
kai\ dedio/tes, mh/ ti kako\n e)cerga/shtai peri\ th\n politei/an,
ka/lliston u(pe/labon ei)lhfe/nai kairo\n e)kpodw\n 
au)to\n poih/sasqai su\n eu)sxh/moni profa/sei. pei/santes
dh\ to\n dh=mon a)postei=lai *)arikhnoi=s disxili/ous a)/ndras
e)pi\ summaxi/an, kai\ strathgo\n a)podei/cantes to\n *)aristo/dhmon
w(s dh\ ta\ pole/mia lampro/n, ta\ meta\ tau=t'
e)/pratton, e)c w(=n h)\ katakoph/sesqai maxo/menon u(po\ tw=n
*turrhnw=n au)to\n u(pela/mbanon h)\ kata\ pe/lagos diafqarh/sesqai.
geno/menoi ga\r u(po\ th=s boulh=s ku/rioi katale/cai
tou\s e)pi\ th\n summaxi/an e)celeusome/nous tw=n me\n

e)pish/mwn kai\ lo/gou a)ci/wn ou)de/na kate/grayan, e)pile/cantes
de\ tou\s a)porwta/tous te kai\ ponhrota/tous
tw=n dhmotikw=n, e)c w(=n a)ei/ tinas u(pw/pteuon newterismou/s,
e)k tou/twn suneplh/rwsan to\n a)po/stolon: kai\
nau=s de/ka palaia\s ka/kista pleou/sas kaqelku/santes, 
w(=n e)trihra/rxoun oi( pene/statoi *kumai/wn, ei)s tau/tas
au)tou\s e)nebi/basan qa/naton a)peilh/santes, e)a/n tis a)poleifqh=| th=s stratei/as.

o( d' *)aristo/dhmos tosou=ton ei)pw\n mo/non, w(s
ou) le/lhqen au)to\n h( dia/noia tw=n e)xqrw=n, o(/ti lo/gw| 
me\n e)pi\ summaxi/an au)to\n a)poste/llousin, e)/rgw| d' ei)s
prou)=pton o)/leqron, de/xetai me\n th\n strathgi/an, a)naxqei\s
d' a(/ma toi=s pre/sbesi tw=n *)arikhnw=n dia\ taxe/wn
kai\ to\ metacu\ pe/lagos e)pipo/nws kai\ kindunwdw=s dianu/sas
o(rmi/zetai kata\ tou\s e)/ggista th=s *)arikei/as ai)gialou/s: 
kai\ katalipw\n e)n tai=s nausi\ fulakh\n a)poxrw=san e)n
th=| prw/th| nukti\ th\n a)po\ qala/sshs o(do\n ou) pollh\n
ou)=san dianu/sas e)pifai/netai toi=s *)arikhnoi=s peri\ to\n
o)/rqron a)prosdo/khtos. qe/menos de\ plhsi/on au)tw=n to\n 
xa/raka kai\ tou\s katapefeugo/tas ei)s ta\ tei/xh pei/sas 
proelqei=n ei)s u(/paiqron prou)kalei=to tou\s *turrhnou\s
eu)qu\s ei)s ma/xhn. genome/nou d' e)k parata/cews a)gw=nos
karterou= oi( me\n *)arikhnoi\ braxu\n pa/nu diamei/nantes
xro/non e)ne/klinan a)qro/oi, kai\ gi/netai pa/lin ei)s to\
tei=xos au)tw=n fugh/: o( d' *)aristo/dhmos su\n toi=s peri\ 
au)to\n loga/si *kumai/wn o)li/gois ou)=si pa=n to\ tou= pole/mou

ba/ros u(posta\s kai\ to\n h(gemo/na tw=n *turrhnw=n
au)toxeiri/a| ktei/nas tre/pei tou\s a)/llous ei)s fugh\n kai\
ni/khn a)nairei=tai pasw=n lamprota/thn. diapraca/menos
de\ tau=ta kai\ timhqei\s u(po\ tw=n *)arikhnw=n pollai=s
dwreai=s a)pe/plei dia\ taxe/wn au)to\s a)/ggelos toi=s *kumai/ois
th=s au(tou= ni/khs boulo/menos gene/sqai: ei(/ponto
d' au)tw=| pollai\ pa/nu tw=n *)arikhnw=n o(lka/des ta\ la/fura
kai\ tou\s ai)xmalw/tous tw=n *turrhnw=n a)/gousai.
w(s de\ plhsi/on e)ge/nonto th=s *ku/mhs, o(rmi/sas ta\s nau=s
e)kklhsi/an tou= stratou= poiei=tai, kai\ polla\ me\n tw=n
proesthko/twn th=s po/lews kathgorh/sas, pollou\s de\
tw=n a)ndragaqhsa/ntwn kata\ th\n ma/xhn e)pai/nous dielqw\n
a)rgu/rio/n te diadou\s au)toi=s kat' a)/ndra kai\ ta\s
para\ tw=n *)arikhnw=n dwrea\s ei)s koino\n a(/pasi kataqei\s
h)ci/ou memnh=sqai tw=n eu)ergesiw=n, a)\n katapleu/swsin
ei)s th\n patri/da, kai\ a)/n tis au)tw=| pote sumbai/nh| ki/ndunos
e)k th=s o)ligarxi/as w(s du/namis e(ka/stw| bohqei=n.
a(pa/ntwn de\ polla\s o(mologou/ntwn au)tw=| xa/ritas ei)de/nai 
th=s t' a)nelpi/stou swthri/as, h(\n di' e)kei=non e)/sxon,
